model_answer: The segment occurs at option D: [00:04:26 - 00:05:18].

The correct answer is A: [00:05:18 - 00:05:45]. In this segment of the video, Nobel Prize laureates and portraits of Satyendra Nath Bose and Albert Einstein are displayed on screen. A female narrator then discusses the elegant cooling method and mentions that the first Bose-Einstein condensate was made in 1995 and the first photon BEC was created recently. Finally, someone says "Lynn."
